Sentencas: The paper provides a performance analysis assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) liquid desiccant tri-generation system for building applications.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: The work presented serves to build upon the current literature related to experimental evaluations of SOFC tri-generation systems, particularly in domestic built environment applications.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: The proposed SOFC liquid desiccant tri-generation system will be the first-of-its-kind.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: No research activity is reported on the integration of SOFC, or any fuel cell, with liquid desiccant air conditioning in a tri-generation system configuration.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: The novel tri-generation system is suited to applications that require simultaneous electrical power, heating and dehumidification cooling.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: There are several specific benefits to the integration of SOFC and liquid desiccant air conditioning technology, including; very high operational electrical efficiencies even at low system capacities and the ability to utilise low-grade thermal energy in a (useful) cooling process.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the novel tri-generation system has the potential to increase thermal energy utilisation and thus the access to the benefits achievable from on-site electrical generation, primarily; reduced emissions and operating costs.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: Using empirical SOFC and liquid desiccant component data, an energetic, economic and environmental performance analysis assessment of the novel system is presented.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: Significant conclusions from the work include: (1) SOFC and liquid desiccant are a viable technological pairing in the development of an efficient and effective tri-generation system.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: High tri-generation efficiencies in the range of 68-71% are attainable.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: (2) The inclusion of liquid desiccant provides an efficiency increase of 9-15% compared to SOFC electrical operation only, demonstrating the potential of the system in building applications that require simultaneous electrical power, heating and/or dehumidification/cooling.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications
Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: Compared to an equivalent base case system, the novel tri-generation system is currently only economically viable with a government's financial support.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: SOFC capital cost and stack replacement are the largest inhibitors to economic viability.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: Environmental performance is closely linked to electrical emission factor, and thus performance is heavily country dependent.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications

Sentencas: (4) The economic and environmental feasibility of the novel tri-generation system will improve with predicted SOFC capital cost reductions and the transition to clean hydrogen production.
Titulo: Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications
Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications
Assessment of a novel solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system for building applications
